posts.post_title: Overgraded High grade Sovereign 150's for sale

posts.post_content: Sorry Pete, I've got a couple of [STRIKE]skinned[/STRIKE] blank backs for you.
i'm only interested if they are overgraded...overpriced...hand cut to give the aura of a scrap...and have sun faded/chemically altered colors so I can call it a print freak.
I only have three that have all of those characteristics, and I'm not married to them, so...

[quote name="Mikehealer" post=1257038]I only have three that have all of those characteristics, and I'm not married to them, so...[/QUOTE]

Pete!!!......JUMP ON THIS!!!
I bet they were all undergraded weren't they !! MY favorites !!
This just might be the funniest BST thread...ever.  :D
